definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy
see 沉默寡言[chen2 mo4 gua3 yan2]

sentences.english: The natural day is very calm, and will hardly reprove his indolence.
sentences.chinese: 时光的天性就是沉静，它不会因此而责备自己的懒惰。

sentences.english: Just take a long breath, and let your thoughts marinate for a bit.
sentences.chinese: 其实你只需要做个深呼吸，让你的思想好好沉静下来。

sentences.english: A woman should learn in quietness and full submission.
sentences.chinese: 女人要沉静学道，一味地顺服。

sentences.english: The glow of a funeral pyre slowly dies by the silent river.
sentences.chinese: 火葬灰中的红光在沉静的河边慢慢地熄灭下去。

sentences.english: The swift and indifferent placidity of that look troubled me.
sentences.chinese: 那一扫而过的冷漠沉静的目光使我深感不安。

sentences.english: The night is still, still in its pervasive stillness, just as that spring night.
sentences.chinese: 夜仍沉静，渗透一切，一如那个春夜。

sentences.english: The twilight and stillness of the drawing-room seemed to increase his numbness.
sentences.chinese: 起居室里昏暗的灯光和沉静的气氛使他越发显得麻木。

sentences.english: The paper windows and hanging scroll remained as still and silent as before.
sentences.chinese: 纸窗和帐子依然是那么沉静。

sentences.english: Who would gradually fall in love with any of this in silence.
sentences.chinese: 任谁都会慢慢爱上这中沉静。

sentences.english: What trembles in the certain light passes silently from you.
sentences.chinese: 在某种光里的震动沉静地流经你。

sentences.english: Let a woman learn in silence with full submission.
sentences.chinese: 女人要沉静学道，一味地顺服。

sentences.english: The echoes had pulsed themselves to silence.
sentences.chinese: 回声阵阵震荡，直到沉静下来。

sentences.english: It was late at night, and all was quiet in the village.
sentences.chinese: 夜深了，村子里沉静下来。

sentences.english: Tis visible silence, still as the hour-glass.
sentences.chinese: 这可见的沉静，沙漏一般的沉静。

sentences.english: Tis visible silence, still as the hour-glass.
sentences.chinese: 这可见的沉静，沙漏一般的沉静。

definition: quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
deep/profound/(of a person) reserved/undemonstrative/(of a voice, sound etc) deep/low-pitched
Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
